Comments_List: Stronger skills in Japanese reading, writing, etc.
I learned to speak/read/write basic Japanese, as well as understand Japanese culture and communication.
I increased my speaking, writing, listening, and reading proficiency in Japanese.
I love this class, it's taught amazingly, the sensee's are fantastic, and it's a lot of fun.
This course had very good instructors, and the coursework/material were excellent.  I really enjoyed the Japanese learning community.
Yes! If you're interested in learning Japanese, there's no better way than studying it here.
I would highly recommend this course to anyone remotely interested in Japanese language or Japanese culture.  It was one of the best decisions that I have made at Yale in terms of course selection.
